main event: A youth observed a disc-shaped craft hovering in Long Beach, California on April 7, 1966, for a duration of 17 seconds.
interesting points: The craft was described as having a dome on top and being drab like steel., The object made a sound described as like a soft siren., The witness stated the object went over a hill and disappeared from sight., The craft appeared solid and was compared in size to one fourth of a match head held at arm's length., The sighting was recorded by a civilian observer, a youth aged 8.
